div.p: A63/565, unit 749, VPRS 1189/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to sanction the following expenditure in this establishment during the first quarter of the year 1863.
